benefits.name: Annual travel credit
benefits.description: $300 travel credit that resets each cardmember year.

benefits.name: DoorDash credits
benefits.description: $5 monthly statement credits toward DoorDash and Caviar orders when you activate DashPass.

benefits.name: DoorDash DashPass membership
benefits.description: Complimentary DashPass membership for primary and authorized users (currently through 12/31/2024).

benefits.name: Instacart+ membership & credits
benefits.description: Instacart+ membership with up to $15 in monthly statement credits (currently through 7/31/2024).

benefits.name: Lyft Pink membership
benefits.description: Complimentary Lyft Pink All Access membership (through 12/31/2024) valued annually.

benefits.name: Lounge visits
benefits.description: Track the value of Priority Pass™, Sapphire Lounge, and Chase Dining lounge access.

benefits.name: Chase Offers
benefits.description: Record savings from Chase Offers applied to Sapphire Reserve purchases.

benefits.name: Points
benefits.description: Track rewards points accrued throughout the year.
